thread.title: Man trolls girlfriend with the most brutal Valentine's Day message ever
thread.title_full: Man trolls girlfriend with the most brutal Valentine's Day message ever

author: Sam Haysom
title: Man trolls girlfriend with the most brutal Valentine's Day message ever
text:
LONDON â€” As far as Valentine's Day pranks go, they don't come much more brutal than this.
SEE ALSO: Man's kiss cam proposal goes horribly, horribly wrong
This is 21-year-old Laura Marie Kerr from Ballymena, Northern Ireland.
turtle neck jumpers help hide my seven chins and I love them pic.twitter.com/sLlOhdexsi
â€” LMK (@lauramariekerr) November 19, 2016
On Valentine's Day, Kerr took to Twitter to to share screengrabs of a message exchange she'd had with her boyfriend, Jay.
It started with talk of a surprise.
Image: twitter/ @lauramariekerr
As Jay mentioned Paris and then Barcelona, the excitement grew...
Image: twitter/ @lauramariekerr
...And then abruptly came crashing down.
Image: twitter/ @lauramariekerr
Yep â€” he'd booked tickets to a Champions League football match.
Image: twitter/ @lauramariekerr
Kerr's tweet â€” which came complete with a fairly no-nonsense caption â€” swiftly went viral. At the time of writing, it's racked up around 25,000 retweets.
this boy is getting smacked into 2018 when I see him pic.twitter.com/zos9eVVzWw
â€” LMK (@lauramariekerr) February 14, 2017
As with anything that goes viral on Twitter, it's attracted its fair share of trolls as well as favourites â€” but Kerr isn't letting any negative responses get her down.
Looks like she had a good Valentine's Day in the end, too.
I love my boyfriend. I am grateful for everything he does. I am lying beside him, happy & in love. ðŸ˜‡
â€” LMK (@lauramariekerr) February 14, 2017
